movies.title: The Witcher
movies.description: A monster hunter with superhuman abilities travels through a fantasy world.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets from their subconscious.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to create chaos in Gotham City.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A group of explorers travels through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Joker
movies.description: The origin story of the iconic villain, exploring the descent into madness of Arthur Fleck.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.description: The final battle for Middle-earth begins as Frodo and Sam approach Mount Doom.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: A banker is wrongly imprisoned for the murder of his wife and her lover, and finds hope in the darkest of places.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
movies.description: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
movies.description: Teenager Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man of his reality, crossing paths with his counterparts from other dimensions.

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.description: The story of the founding of Facebook and the legal battles that followed.

series.title: Stranger Things
series.description: A group of kids uncover a series of supernatural mysteries in their small town.

series.title: Breaking Bad
series.description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer.

series.title: Money Heist
series.description: A criminal mastermind plans the biggest heist in history.

series.title: The Crown
series.description: The reign of Queen Elizabeth II, detailing the personal and political events that shaped the latter half of the 20th century.

series.title: The Witcher
series.description: A monster hunter with superhuman abilities travels through a fantasy world.

series.title: Fargo
series.description: Various chronicles of deception, intrigue, and murder in and around Minnesota.

series.title: Black Mirror
series.description: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

series.title: The Mandalorian
series.description: The adventures of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy.

series.title: The Office
series.description: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, documenting their lives as they try to get through the workday.

series.title: Westworld
series.description: A futuristic amusement park with robotic hosts caters to rich guests who can live out their fantasies.

series.title: Narcos
series.description: The true story of the rise and fall of Pablo Escobar and the Medellin drug cartel.

series.title: Ozark
series.description: A financial planner relocates his family to the Ozarks after a money-laundering scheme goes wrong.
